name: Croaky Kingdom
description:
How long can you make the Kingdom of FROGTOPIA last?

Using the arrow keys, smush the fragspawns to make tadpoles and so on until you reach FROG ASCENCION. Smushing gains power, which can be spent on potential heirs! The kingdom ends when there's no heir to take over!

Seasons last 14 moves, watch out for apocalyptic events in summer and winter!

I thought I had fixed the targets/arrows remaining - apparently not! Sorry about that!

Cute frog font - https://www.dafont.com/cute-frog.font

Music: Somnia II - Reed Mathis (YouTube Audio Library)

I created the frog in PicoCAD!
